activities: Corporate Translations is a leading provider of translation solutions to the world's leading pharmaceutical companies.  Although it is the responsibility of our customers to redact all personal information from the documents they send us for translation and archiving, it is not always the case.  In addition to the PII that may occasionally be seen on documents for translation there is also our employee information.
contacttitle1: Director of Organizational Development and Quality
corpofftitle1: Director of Organizational Development and Quality
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Corporate customer names, customer phone, customer address, customer credit card information
recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of personal information should be directed to the Corporate Translations Headquarters at the address given below. Corporate Translations will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of personal information by reference to the principles contained in this Policy. For disputes involving personal information received by Corporate Translations from its customers, Corporate Translations utilizes the services of a licensed moderator from the American Arbitration Association to mitigate and resolve any disputes.
